sentences.sentence: Asked his nationality, he said American.
sentences.translation: 问到他的国籍，他说是美国人。

sentences.sentence: All applicants will be considered regardless of age, sex, religion or nationality.
sentences.translation: 所有申请者，不论其年龄、性别、宗教信仰及国籍，都可考虑。

sentences.sentence: "For us", he said, "every man and woman of French nationality is French."
sentences.translation: “对我们来说，”他说，“每一个法国国籍的男人和女人都是法国人。”
